channel.title: A Big mistake by MoparScape Staff!
channel.description:
Recently i started a server and decided to add it to the status page.
I wasn't going to make a whole thing so i went to one of the pages on the page and edited it to use there layout, i edited it and added my server.
I look around and see alot of the server 'RUNEKEEP' which was the base i used on there, i notice when i come back there all removed meaning hes got banned, and i try adding my server and im banned!
So i think status staff have looked at my layout and said, omg another one and banned me from using page, this is so depressing to me.
I belived i broke 0 rules no selling admins, no nothing like that just a page and it was banned!
BANNED SERVER:64.22.75.161
Please unban,
Ty the box noob

item.title: A Big mistake by MoparScape Staff!
item.dc:creator: @The_Box_Noob The Box Noob
item.description:
@The_Box_Noob wrote:

Recently i started a server and decided to add it to the status page.

I wasn’t going to make a whole thing so i went to one of the pages on the page and edited it to use there layout, i edited it and added my server.

I look around and see alot of the server ‘RUNEKEEP’ which was the base i used on there, i notice when i come back there all removed meaning hes got banned, and i try adding my server and im banned!

So i think status staff have looked at my layout and said, omg another one and banned me from using page, this is so depressing to me.

I belived i broke 0 rules no selling admins, no nothing like that just a page and it was banned!

BANNED SERVER:64.22.75.161

Please unban,

Ty the box noob
